summary.span: L'espace de noms fournit les méthodes définies par les normes Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) version 3 (V3) et Directory Services Markup Language (DSML) version 2.0 (V2).

span.span: The namespace provides the methods defined in the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) version 3 (V3) and Directory Services Markup Language (DSML) version 2.0 (V2) standards.
